post.content:
Title: XML Developer
Posted On: 2/19/2010 9:37:51 AM
Designation: XML Developer
Number of Vacancies: 1
Qualifications: Degree in Computer field
Essential Skills:
Oracle - 3 yrs.
JavaScript - 3 yrs.
DB2 - 3 yrs.
PL/SQL - 3 yrs.
MS SQL Server - 3 yrs.
XML/XSL - 3 yrs.
Minimum Experience: 3 yrs.
Job Tenure: Full-time Only
Salary Offered: Not specified
Job Location: Toronto, ON, Canada
Job Description
Requirements:

--The MUST HAVE skills: XML syntax and scripting, XML schema creation and usage, XSL, the ability to create and consistently apply standards to data extraction, translation and presentation
post.title: XML Developer
